attributes.action: Posthumously strip Margaret Thatcher of all titles
attributes.background: In the wake of the Hillsborough Disaster the then Prime Minister either blindly swallowed the lies told or was complicit in the creation of them. Given the prolonged agony she helped cause and insidious lies it is incomprehensible she remain a peer

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
